subject: Fishing, Sport
Bass (Fish)
lead_paragraph: Kevin VanDam won his sixth Bassmaster Angler of the Year award Saturday, making him the highest-earning angler in the history of the Bass Anglers Sportsman Society.
snippet: Kevin VanDam won his sixth Bassmaster Angler of the Year award Saturday, making him the highest-earning angler in the history of the Bass Anglers Sportsman Society.
